"A.P.238/4/4": "Hahaha! Can you hear me? Of course you can! My voice rolls like thunder!"
"As you all know, I'm Huey of the Council of Six!"
"Hey, ARKS! Don't look away from the monitor!"
"I wouldn't hijack the monitors on a whim! This is an important announcement from the Council of Six!"
"Everyone! You worked hard during the decisive battle against Dark Falz the other day!"
"With everyone working together, we were somehow able to repel the guy! We are victorious!"
"So, to celebrate this victory, we're thinking of holding an event!"
"I will be organizing it! レギアスからの許可もばっちりもらっているから心配するな!"
"日頃の鍛錬の成果を見せつけるようなどでかいものを考えているから楽しみに待つように！"
